title: I don't know why my account has been suspended
body: I was playing game normally until 11:30 pm 7/11/2015, when I log on my account, it shows"This account has been suspended until 21 November,2015, please check the email address associated with your League of legends account for additional details" But i have receive no email from riot and i do not know why this happened, I am sure I did nothing wrong. I just want to know why.

replies.body: I did nothing wrong!!!!!! why riot do this to me!!!!!! not fair!!!!!!!!

Your account was picked up by our elo boosting detection and had the standard penalties applied. For more info on what is considred elo boosting and the penalties see here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751834-MMR-Elo-Boosting

REKT

Nice boost XD lmao.

How much ?

i am wagering its probably something to do with the reporting system.they just changed it so might be a glitch, or you have been report and they are paying attention.

i guess no more "report me, they dont do anything" comments from intentional feeders or nasty comments from salty people if they are paying attention now lol. (not saying you guys have done anything just stating that these people are screwed if the report system means something now. 

as for an answer, i would guess you might need to contact support/put in ticket :s
